name: displayvideo_advertisers_channels_patch
description: Updates a channel. Returns the updated channel if successful.

advertiserId.description: The ID of the advertiser that owns the created channel.

channelId.description: Output only. The unique ID of the channel. Assigned by the system.

partnerId.description: The ID of the partner that owns the created channel.

updateMask.description: Required. The mask to control which fields to update.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

Channel.description: A single channel. Channels are custom groups of related websites and apps.

advertiserId.description: The ID of the advertiser that owns the channel.

channelId.description: Output only. The unique ID of the channel. Assigned by the system.

displayName.description: Required. The display name of the channel. Must be UTF-8 encoded with a maximum length of 240 bytes.

name.description: Output only. The resource name of the channel.

negativelyTargetedLineItemCount.description: Output only. Number of line items that are directly targeting this channel negatively.

partnerId.description: The ID of the partner that owns the channel.

positivelyTargetedLineItemCount.description: Output only. Number of line items that are directly targeting this channel positively.

$block: A single channel. Channels are custom groups of related websites and apps.

$ul: **advertiserId**: The ID of the advertiser that owns the channel.
**channelId**: Output only. The unique ID of the channel. Assigned by the system.
**displayName**: Required. The display name of the channel. Must be UTF-8 encoded with a maximum length of 240 bytes.
**name**: Output only. The resource name of the channel.
**negativelyTargetedLineItemCount**: Output only. Number of line items that are directly targeting this channel negatively.
**partnerId**: The ID of the partner that owns the channel.
**positivelyTargetedLineItemCount**: Output only. Number of line items that are directly targeting this channel positively.
